import { Component, OnInit, } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { introduction: string = ""; constructor(){ this.introduction = "> IS ANYONE THERE ?" } ngOnInit(){ } ngAfterViewInit() { } }
